description_txt: stated on December 20, 2015 in an interview on NBC's "Meet the Press".:
quote_txt: "We didn't go out and take" information from the Hillary Clinton campaign.

description_txt: stated on December 5, 2015 in a speech at the Rising Tide Summit in Cedar Rapids, Iowa:
quote_txt: "The Democrats in the Senate last year introduced a constitutional amendment to repeal the free speech protections of the First Amendment."

description_txt: stated on December 19, 2015 in a Democratic debate in New Hampshire:
quote_txt: Says Bernie Sanders "voted for regime change with respect to Libya."

description_txt: stated on December 13, 2015 in an interview on Meet the Press:
quote_txt: The only budget Ted Cruz "ever voted for in his time in the Senate is a budget that cut defense spending by more than Barack Obama proposes we cut it."

description_txt: stated on December 9, 2015 in an interview.:
quote_txt: "Only nine" coalition nations with the U.S. "are truly actively involved" in fighting the Islamic State.

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in a Republican presidential debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: Says the Obama administration invited "Russia into Syria."

description_txt: stated on December 10, 2015 in a radio interview.:
quote_txt: Says he faced "a record budget deficit" in Virginia in 2014.

description_txt: stated on November 16, 2015 in a news conference:
quote_txt: Wisconsin "is on pace to double the number of layoffs" this year.

description_txt: stated on December 20, 2015 in an interview on NBC's "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: Says American polling shows Russian President Vladimir Putin has "an 80 percent approval rating."

description_txt: stated on December 20, 2015 in comments on 'Meet the Press':
quote_txt: The Affordable Care Act is "making families pay double-digit premium increases."

description_txt: stated on December 19, 2015 in the Dec. 19 Democratic presidential debate:
quote_txt: The United States spends "almost three times per capita what they spend in the U.K." on health care and "50 percent more than they pay in France."

description_txt: stated on December 19, 2015 in the Dec. 19 Democratic presidential debate:
quote_txt: "Secretary Clinton changes her position on (gun issues) every election year, it seems, having one position in 2000 and then campaigning against President Obama and saying we don't need federal standards."

description_txt: stated on December 19, 2015 in the Dec. 19 Democratic presidential debate:
quote_txt: ISIS is "going to people showing videos of Donald Trump insulting Islam and Muslims in order to recruit more radical jihadists."

description_txt: stated on December 3, 2015 in an interview with New Hampshire Public Radio:
quote_txt: Says the Security Against Foreign Enemies Act of 2015 would not "pause" the resettlement of Syrian refugees in the United States.

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in a Republican presidential debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: "One of the most troubling aspects of the Rubio-Schumer Gang of Eight bill was that it gave President Obama blanket authority to admit refugees, including Syrian refugees, without mandating any background checks whatsoever."

description_txt: stated on December 13, 2015 in an interview on ABC News' "This Week":
quote_txt: "Our larger domestic threat is from racial supremacist groups."

description_txt: stated on December 8, 2015 in a press conference with Sen. Ted Cruz:
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama "himself has granted waivers allowing into the United States refugees who provided material support to terrorists."

description_txt: stated on December 9, 2015 in an interview:
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama’s homeland security budget had "$16 million to fight climate change" but "didn't have a line item to fight violent extremism."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in the Republican debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: The 9/11 terrorists' friends, family, girlfriends in the United States "were sent back for the most part to Saudi Arabia. They knew what was going on. They went home, and they wanted to watch their boyfriends on television."

description_txt: stated on December 6, 2015 in Op-ed column in the San Antonio Express-News:
quote_txt: "The Electric Reliability Council of Texas (ERCOT) has estimated that the Obama administration’s Power Plan will cause energy costs in Texas to rise as much as 16 percent per year."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in a Republican presidential debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: "If you are going to kill the families of terrorists, realize that there's something called the Geneva Convention we're going to have to pull out of."

description_txt: stated on November 22, 2015 in a TV interview:
quote_txt: The Milwaukee County bus system has "among the highest fares in the nation."

description_txt: stated on December 7, 2015 in a speech:
quote_txt: "Since 2004, more than 2,000 suspected terrorists have legally purchased weapons in the United States."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in a Republican presidential debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: Regarding the USA Freedom Act, "There is nothing we are allowed to do under this bill that we could not do before."

description_txt: stated on November 7, 2015 in a web post:
quote_txt: "Recent news reports indicate DWI crashes in Austin dropped 23 percent since ridesharing entered the market."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in a Republican presidential debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: Says carpet bombing means bombing "not a city, but the location of the troops," with "embedded special forces to direct the air power."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in the CNN debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: Says Ted Cruz supports "legalizing people who are in this country illegally."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in a GOP debate on CNN:
quote_txt: "One of the things I would immediately do … is bring back the warrior class -- Petraeus, McChrystal, Mattis, Keane, Flynn. ... Every one was retired early because they told President Obama things that he didn’t want to hear."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in in the CNN debate in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: Says Marco Rubio "is the one for an open border."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2015 in a GOP debate on CNN:
quote_txt: "Two months ago, Donald Trump said that ISIS was not our fight."
